last_episode_to_air.name: Bad Help
last_episode_to_air.overview: Concerned about looking like a bad ally, Freddie attempts to hide his racist family history from their friends and neighbors and Todd gets some hollow help from Ollie with his school project.

name: The Harper House
overview: An overconfident female head-of-a-household struggles to regain a higher status for herself, and for her family of oddballs, after losing her job and moving from the rich side to the poor side of an Arkansas small town. To save money, theyâ€™ve moved into their inherited Victorian fixer upper, the historic Harper House.

episodes.name: The Harper House
episodes.overview: After being let go from her high-paying job, Debbie Harper (Rhea Seehorn), her husband Freddie (Jason Lee), and their twins, Todd (Ryan Flynn) and Ollie (Tatiana Maslany), move into a Victorian fixer-upper on the poorer side of town and attempt to win over their new neighbors by hosting a WrestleMonium watch party.

episodes.name: Conflicting Parenting Books
episodes.overview: Debbie and Freddie's conflicting parenting styles become more apparent. Meanwhile, Todd and Ollie compete in the "Leaf-A-Thon" at their new school.

episodes.name: The Perfect Gift/ Marg Truck
episodes.overview: Freddie, Todd and Ollie compete to find the perfect birthday gift for Debbie. Meanwhile, Debbie and her best friend, Tonya, see a brilliant, but illegal, business opportunity in a margarita food truck.

episodes.name: That Old House/ Friend Stacking
episodes.overview: Debbie and Freddie find the perfect friends, but are annoyed when they turn out to be friend-stackers. Todd struggles to move on from the past.

episodes.name: Baby Talk/ Coupon Kid
episodes.overview: With her sister Brenna's questionable support, Debbie resorts to "baby talk" to make sales at Awning Con. Meanwhile, Shauna Bradley scams an impressionable Freddie.

episodes.name: Everyone In Town Must Eat A Piece Of Barack Obama Before Midnight Or The World Ends
episodes.overview: When Ollie believes everyone must consume a piece of President Barack Obama in order to save the town, Debbie worries about her gullibility. Todd is determined to stop Mayor Kelly Frakes' fracking expansion plan.

episodes.name: Marshmallow Tests
episodes.overview: Opposite personality traits become more apparent in the Harper family when Debbie and Freddie collaborate on a business idea and when Todd and Ollie search for a new toy on the market.

episodes.name: Home Alone On The 4th Of July
episodes.overview: The Harpers celebrate the Fourth of July at the River Creek Fourth Fest and it's far from a relaxing holiday; Freddie consumes a questionable funnel cake and Debbie protects the neighborhood from a robbery... or so she thinks.

episodes.name: Deathbed Wish / Make The Lie Real
episodes.overview: A trip with Daddy Dan and Brenna commemorating her mother's passing proves to be more enlightening than Debbie imagined. Meanwhile, Freddie ropes Tonya, Ollie and Todd into a scheme to impress Gbenge.

episodes.name: Bad Help
episodes.overview: Concerned about looking like a bad ally, Freddie attempts to hide his racist family history from their friends and neighbors and Todd gets some hollow help from Ollie with his school project.
